## CameraRig.setWorldCoordinates() method

Sets world coordinates for the camera, and configures rig component transforms accordingly.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setWorldCoordinates({ position, quaternion }: {
        position: Vector3;
        quaternion: Quaternion;
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { position, quaternion } | { position: Vector3; quaternion: Quaternion; } |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
